title: Maori arts and culture. No. 1. Carving and decoration
creator_credit: Ronald Bowie, Cyril Morton, Geoffrey Scott and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: Explains how the traditional Maori art of carving has been revived in New Zealand. Emphasises the creation of new forms in this ancient art by the use of modern materials and machines. Filmed at the Artifacts Dominion Museum, New Zealand.
